name: Implicate
effect: Plant evidence implicating someone else for the crew's crimes

name: Scout
effect: Learn the name, contact, or danger of an adjacent region

name: Expand Network
effect: Permanent +1d to gather information rolls in the chosen region

name: Jailbreak
effect: Gain access to a character's prison cell and sneak them to freedom

name: Lay Trap
effect: +2d to the next engagement roll that involes ambushing or surprising the enemy
